update resource_agreement
resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
allCost = #{allcost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
earnest = #{earnest,jdbcType=INTEGER},
final_payment = #{finalPayment,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay = #{pay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_man = #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_party = #{firstParty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_des = #{typeDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status_code = #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status_des = #{statusDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adviser = #{adviser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
urgent_code = #{urgentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
urgent_des = #{urgentDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proxy_cost = #{proxyCost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
government_cost = #{governmentCost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
non_chapter_file_name = #{nonChapterFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
has_chapter_file_name = #{hasChapterFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
final_file_name = #{finalFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sure_doc_img_name = #{sureDocImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icd_face_img_name = #{icdFaceImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icd_reverse_img_name = #{icdReverseImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
license_img_name = #{licenseImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proxy_img_name = #{proxyImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where agreement_id = #{agreementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update resource_agreement set resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, allCost = #{allcost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, earnest = #{earnest,jdbcType=INTEGER}, final_payment = #{finalPayment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay = #{pay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_man = #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_party = #{firstParty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_des = #{typeDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status_code = #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status_des = #{statusDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adviser = #{adviser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urgent_code = #{urgentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urgent_des = #{urgentDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proxy_cost = #{proxyCost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, government_cost = #{governmentCost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, non_chapter_file_name = #{nonChapterFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, has_chapter_file_name = #{hasChapterFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, final_file_name = #{finalFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sure_doc_img_name = #{sureDocImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icd_face_img_name = #{icdFaceImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icd_reverse_img_name = #{icdReverseImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, license_img_name = #{licenseImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proxy_img_name = #{proxyImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where agreement_id = #{agreementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT agreement_id AS agreementId, first_party AS firstParty, link_man AS linkMan, email AS linkMan_email, address AS firstParty_address, adviser AS adviser, adviser AS adviser_email, adviser AS adviser_phoneNumber, phone_number AS linkMan_phoneNumber, DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE,'%Y-%c-%d') AS sign_date_2, CAST(allCost AS CHAR) AS allCost_1, CAST(earnest AS CHAR) AS earnest, CAST(final_payment AS CHAR) AS final_payment, DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE,'%Y-%c-%d') AS sign_date_1, DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE,'%Y-%c-%d') AS sign_date_3, DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE,'%Y-%c-%d') AS sign_date_4, first_party AS sign_firstParty_1, link_man AS sign_linkMan_1, address AS sign_firstParty_address_1, adviser AS sign_adviser_1, adviser AS sign_address_1, first_party AS sign_first_party_2, link_man AS sign_linkMan_2, adviser AS sign_adviser_2, CAST(allCost AS CHAR) AS allCost, CASE WHEN final_payment>0 THEN 'stages_pay' WHEN final_payment= 0 THEN 'only_one_pay' END pay_type FROM `resource_agreement` WHERE agreement_id= #{agreementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from resource_agreement where status_code in (#{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND adviser=#{adviser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
